title: Add e2e tests for git diff API
description:
Write e2e tests that exercise the git diff API end-to-end.

## Test Scenarios
1. Create diff tab with path + diffMode=unstaged
2. Create diff tab with path + diffMode=staged
3. Create diff tab with path + diffMode=head
4. Error case: path not in git repo
5. Error case: invalid diffMode
6. Verify diff content is properly rendered in browser (chromedp)

## Setup
- Create temp directory with git repo
- Make file changes (staged and unstaged)
- Call API and verify responses
